northern_leaf_blight.name: Northern Leaf Blight
northern_leaf_blight.description: Fungal disease causing long, grayish lesions on leaves.
northern_leaf_blight.recommendation: Use resistant varieties and crop rotation.

common_rust.name: Common Rust
common_rust.description: Small, powdery brown pustules on both leaf surfaces.
common_rust.recommendation: Apply fungicides early if symptoms appear.

gray_leaf_spot.name: Gray Leaf Spot
gray_leaf_spot.description: Rectangular lesions running parallel to leaf veins.
gray_leaf_spot.recommendation: Remove infected crop residue from the field.

healthy.name: Healthy
healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms.
